textAfterTable: 24 Songs Biography Born: 23 September 1934 in Monfalcone, Friuli-Venezia Giulia Genre: Pop Years Active: '60s, '80s, '00s Though he was born in Monfalcone, in Gorizia (near modern-day Slovenia and Croatia), as a young child Gino Paoli moved across Italy to Genoa, and it was that city with which he was associated and that he called his home. In the 1950s he worked as a porter and a graphic designer before realizing it was music at which he was most talented. Singing in local bands (one of them with friend Luigi Tenco), Paoli was discovered by Ricordi, and soon he was recording tracks for them. In 1960 he released the...
